title: One Piece Ep. 379 Recap: Brook's Past. A Sad Farewell With His Cheerful Comrade
author: The Adult Swim Squad
description: Detailed episode recap covering the Rumbar Pirates' meeting with Laboon and the emotional farewell at Twin Capes. The reviewer notes this episode effectively establishes the friendship dynamics and foreshadows the tragedy to follow.

title: 379-381: Brook's Past! A Sad Farewell with His Cheerful Comrade!
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: First-time viewer analysis of episodes 379-381. The reviewer noted that the Strawhats listened to Brook's story and recognized how much the Rumbar Pirates and Laboon meant to Brook. Compares Brook's past as up there with Robin's and Chopper's in terms of emotional impact.

title: One Piece: Why Brook Has the Saddest Backstory & Will Have the Worst Fate
author: CBR
description: Analysis article discussing Brook's tragic backstory as presented in Episode 379 and subsequent episodes. Argues that Brook has the saddest backstory among Straw Hats because his Revive-Revive Fruit means he will outlive his current crew as well, repeating his tragedy.

title: One Piece: The History of Bink's Sake
author: Aaditya Singh
description: Comprehensive article about the history and significance of 'Bink's Sake' (Bink's Brew), the song featured prominently in Episode 379. Discusses how Oda asked composer Kohei Tanaka to write it, and how the song wouldn't premiere until five years after completion. Details the song's importance to the Rumbar Pirates and its emotional weight.

title: Episode 379 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 379 including production details, plot summary, characters, trivia (including Pandaman appearance and 4:3 aspect ratio note), and manga chapter adaptation information.

title: Brook's Past! A Sad Farewell with His Cheerful Comrade! - IMDb
author: IMDb
description: IMDb page for Episode 379 with an 8.1/10 rating. Contains episode information, cast details, and user reviews noting the emotional impact of Brook's backstory.

title: Laboon Meets Brook - One Piece Episode 379
author: sortastupidsean
description: TikTok video clip featuring the emotional moments from Episode 379 where the Rumbar Pirates first meet Laboon and bond with him through music.

title: Brook Reunites With Laboon - One Piece Episode 379
author: sortastupidsean
description: TikTok video focusing on the reunion aspects and emotional connection between Brook and Laboon as depicted in Episode 379's flashback.
